action.description: edit/submit. If action is submited, the order status will be changed and an email will be sent from workato.

order_id.description: UUID of the order to be updated

contract_id.description: UUID of the contract related to the order to be updated

order_name.description: New Name ID of the order to be updated

start_date.description: New Start date of the order in format %Y-%m-%d. Must be higher than the contract start date and the last start date

end_date.description: New End date of the order in format %Y-%m-%d. Must be lower than the contract end date

account_id.description: UUID of the account related to the order to be updated
